JJ_White:
{{short description|American country music group}} {{Infobox musical artist | name = JJ White | image = | caption = | image_size = | alias = | origin = [[Yuba City, California]] | genre = [[Country music|Country]] | years_active = 1989-2003 | label = [[Curb Records|Curb]] | past_members = Janice White
Jayne White }} '''JJ White''' was an American [[country music]] duo from [[Yuba City, California]] composed of sisters Janice and Jayne White. Signed to [[Curb Records]] in 1989, the duo charted four singles on the ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]'' [[Hot Country Songs|Hot Country Singles & Tracks]] chart between 1991 and 1992.{{cite book|last=Whitburn|first=Joel|title=Hot Country Songs 1944 to 2008|publisher=Record Research, Inc|page=210|year=2008|isbn=978-0-89820-177-2}} Their 1991 debut album, ''Janice and Jayne'', received a B rating from [[Entertainment Weekly]]'s [[Alanna Nash]].{{cite news|last=Nash|first=Alanna|title=Janice and Jayne Review|url=https://ew.com/article/1991/08/16/janice-and-jayne/|accessdate=August 31, 2011|newspaper=[[Entertainment Weekly]]|date=August 16, 1991}} Their second album ''Scratches on Her Knees'' was independently produced and released in 1999.{{cite news|last=Bransford|first=Scott|url=https://www.appeal-democrat.com/y-s-entertainer-community-spirited-jayne-white-dies/article_a04a82f5-ee20-5dd9-83bf-8862cb75b945.html|title=Y-S entertainer, community-spirited Jayne White dies|newspaper=[[Appeal-Democrat]]|date=July 29, 2003}} Jayne White died in 2003 from cancer. ==Discography== ===Albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! style="width:14em;"| Title ! style="width:16em;"| Album details |- ! scope="row"| ''Janice & Jayne'' | * Release date: June 18, 1991 * Label: [[Curb Records]] |- ! scope="row"| ''Scratches on Her Knees'' | * Release date: 1999 * Label: Self-released |} ===Singles=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! rowspan="2"| Year ! rowspan="2" style="width:12em;"| Single ! Peak positions ! rowspan="2"| Album |- style="font-size:smaller;" ! width="65"| [[Hot Country Songs|US Country]]
